1445710.name: Mystical Mayhem Demo
1445710.description:
Hi All!


We are a small indie company working on our first VR game.

We are excited to see how much everyone enjoys our concept and ideas behind our cheeky take on a streamer trying to capture audiences from around the world. In a metaphoric sense, we think we are in the same shoes of Bob Mayhem trying to get people to notice the little game that we've created.

So here's a demo build with endless mode and timed mode unlocked which is just one of the many different experiential rooms available in Mystical Mayhem for your enjoyment!

About the Full Game

The full version of Mystical Mayhem will include the full story mode adventure experience of Bob as he tries to take on the haunted mansion in his quest for more audiences. It'll include new experience zones, puzzle rooms, more types of enemies and weapons.
